Hiring Experienced Web Designer

This is an exciting opportunity to join a developing, well established and growing firm specializing in custom websites and Internet marketing. Here you will find a fast-paced environment that focuses on the creation of quality sites. You will design custom websites based on client objectives and project requirements.
 
Responsibilities
- Responsible for the graphic design of websites
- Plan websites through sitemaps and wireframes
- Coordinate with team members to ensure delivery of successful projects
 
Requirements
- 3 or more years of professional design experience
- A strong portfolio demonstrating experience with web design
- Proficient in the use of Photoshop and Illustrator
- Solid understanding of HTML5/CSS3
- Interpersonal skills in case you had to communicate directly with clients
- Ability to work independently and in collaboration with others
- Capable of working concurrently on multiple projects
- Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail
- Excellent oral and written communication skills- Enthusiasm and creativity to provide original ideas
 
Bonus Points- Experience with UI interactions- Experience with branding and logo design
 
This is a full-time employment opportunity. @Nilecode You can forward your CV to: Ahmed Raslan
